listing.listing_description:
Enjoy a vista worthy of royalty at King’s View. Set on its own private stretch of sand just minutes from Harbour Island’s famous Pink Sand Beach, this beautiful vacation rental looks out over the turquoise waters of the bay on the island’s south end. Reserve this eight-bedroom luxury property for a relaxed holiday with extended family, or a fishing or snorkeling getaway with friends.

The villa has everything you’d expect from a beachfront resort, from a heated infinity pool, 25-meter lap pool and steps down to the sand to al-fresco lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and an outdoor kitchen. Inside, you’ll find more five-star amenities such as ping-pong and pool tables, an exercise room and, for entertainment, a sound system and Wi-Fi.

Inspired by the traditional architecture of the Bahamas, this newly built residence has plenty of charm. Swinging daybeds, a turtle pond and lanterns from New Orleans set a gracious tone in the entry courtyard that continues inside with shiplap walls and pecky cypress ceilings. An open-plan great room is a natural gathering place, with its pair of tufted leather sofas, dining table for eight, and fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

Each of the eight bedrooms at King’s View has an en-suite bathroom, and several have separate entrances, making them perfect for the couple still on honeymoon or in-laws seeking privacy. There are six bedrooms with king beds, including one master suite with an al-fresco shower and one bedroom with its own kitchenette, one bedroom with two twin beds, and one children’s room with two twin bunk beds.

While King’s View feels like your own oceanfront retreat, it’s not far from dining and shopping at the popular Aquapazza Wine Bar and Restaurant or in Dunmore Town. Stroll barefoot on your own private beach or make the short walk to Pink Sand Beach, or let the nearby water taxi take you around Harbour Island and Eleuthera.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The approach to Mer Soleil sets the stage for an exotic French Creole villa with Mediterranean flair. Colorful mosaics embedded in whitewash walls hug the teak main gate further flanked by tall palms in oversized planters. Past the gate, the stone paved drive is edged with colorful tropical shrubs and palms. Arches, terracotta roofing, columns and ironwork define the entrance. The view dazzles as you enter the home. The turquoise pool edged by tropical foliage draws your eye to the Caribbean Sea and brilliant blue sky. Within view are the island of Saba, Baie Lounge Beach and the luxury hotel La Samanna. At night, sunsets are simply brilliant.

The villa flows seamlessly from the interiors to the covered terraces and onto the spacious pool terrace. The open plan great room mixes Caribbean touches with French style. Arched windows, doors and ironwork add to the exotic attitude. Rattan, teak, painted and tiled furniture accent the local art and interesting accessories. Cream and blue tones connect the seating and dining area. A large Provençal style kitchen, in beautiful wood cabinetry and marble tiles with high-end appliances, is a very elegant place to prepare a meal, whether by a professional or amateur chef. The main kitchen opens to the view and to a gorgeous blue tile Moroccan inspired covered outdoor kitchen and dining gazebo. It is a stunning place to cook and dine al-fresco. The gazebo also houses additional living room seating overlooking the gardens and ocean view.

Three bedrooms are in the main villa; two off the upper terrace and one at garden level. Two additional bedrooms are in a private cottage tucked behind the villa. All bedrooms have either sea or garden views plus private seating inside and out. Poster beds, rattan and teak furniture, charming Provence and tropical inspired fabrics in blues, yellows and white create a romantic feel to the rooms. The en-suite bathrooms are gorgeous in traditional Provençal tiles and mosaics, each room in a different color. Several bathrooms have either sea or garden views from their walk-in showers. The cottage bedroom suites each have a wet bar and fridge while also providing an interconnecting door, a great feature for families.

You are close to amenities. Wonderful gourmet food and wine stores are just a short drive in Cupecoy. A short 15-minute drive and you are at the International airport or the nightlife of Maho. The French Capital, Marigot, is only 15 minutes from the villa where you can enjoy Duty Free shopping, boutiques, bakeries and the Creole Market.

listing.listing_description:
This three-bedroom villa boasts contemporary decor, dramatic sea views and a stunning infinity pool looking out over the Pointe Milou hillside—it’s easily one of our must-see St. Barts vacation rentals. The island of St. Barts, with its perpetual sunshine, is a tropical paradise attracting the rich and famous from around the world.

Enjoy the refreshing Caribbean trade winds while lounging on one of the villa’s cozy sun beds out on the sun deck—they’re next to the infinity-edge pool that appears to blend into the ocean beyond. Grill up a casual meal on the gas barbecue and dine alfresco on the outdoor table. With Wi-Fi access throughout the villa you and your guests can stay connected during your stay, and as an extra bonus, daily housekeeping (except for Sundays and holidays), is provided to keep the villa up to par.

The interior of this chic two-level home offers sleek furnishings, vaulted ceilings and stylish decor pieces. The main living room and dining area open up to the terrace and pool deck and showing off the incredible sea and island views. The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped for you to create a home-cooked meal with stainless steel appliances, and gadgets like a blender and espresso machine.

The villa’s three bedrooms are divided between the two levels and can comfortably sleep up to six guests. The master, king-sized, bedroom is located on the upper level while the two other queen-sized bedrooms sit on the lower. All three rooms feature en-suite bathrooms with showers, air-conditioning, flatscreen televisions and ocean views.

You will have easy access to the nearby Lorient beach as well as the Christopher Hotel’s spa services and restaurants. A 7.6 km drive brings you to the capital town, Gustavia, where you can explore the high-end boutiques and diverse restaurants.

listing.listing_description:
This exquisite beachfront home is located within Sailrock Resort on South Caicos island, one of the finest luxury resorts in Turks and Caicos. Perched at a slight elevation just steps from the water, the villa's 3,590 square-foot estate features twenty-five feet of private frontage, an ample swimming pool, and uninterrupted, panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea. Dual master bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms make it an ideal choice for two couples or a family. Your vacation rental incudes access to Sailrock's world-class amenities, along with daily breakfast at the resort and complimentary housekeeping. Numerous other deluxe services are available.

The luminous home harmonizes beautifully with the stunning natural beauty of South Caicos, inspiring a profound connection with the spirit of the sea. Two terraces flank the interior great room, with open walls creating an enchanting cross-breeze. Savor the sunlight on armchairs facing the vast horizon, and dip into the refreshing pool. Step from the deck onto the pristine sand and swim in the timeless Caribbean.

The great room features peaked ceilings with beautiful exposed-wood beams sheltering an open-concept living and dining area. The kitchen is superbly appointed for the contemporary gourmet, and easily serves the breakfast bar, interior dining table, and alfresco table on the terrace. The lounge is perfect for relaxing with your favorite TV shows or merely admiring the breathtaking ocean views. Ceiling fans complement the breezes, while air conditioning ensures comfort when needed.

There is a master suite on either side of the great room, both opening to the pool terrace and beautiful ocean views. Each features a king bed, desk, air conditioning, TV, and superb ensuite bathroom with open-air rain shower and tub.

Sailrock Resort offers a wealth of amenities and activities for guests of all ages, including swimming pools, a fitness center, and a variety of watersports. The superb Na Spa specializes in deluxe treatments including Balinese hot stone massage. Dining options include the Great House Restaurant, featuring a wrap-around deck with 360-degree views of the Atlantic Ocean and Caicos Banks. Beyond the resort, you're about four kilometers from the island's famous Salt Salinas. Proximity to the airport makes the villa a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This four-bedroom villa is located within Diamante Cabo San Lucas, a renowned resort in Los Cabos featuring two world-class golf courses. An enchanting private haven within this oceanfront paradise, the home features its own swimming pool and hot tub, ample outdoor living areas, and beautifully furnished interiors with a gourmet kitchen. Accommodations for twelve guests—including a child-friendly bunkroom—provide an ideal base for families, destination wedding guests, and large groups of friends. Your vacation rental includes a variety of deluxe services and resort privileges, including complimentary access to the ten-acre Crystal Lagoon.

The villa's spacious terraces invites you to relax and celebrate together under the clear skies of Baja Sur. Soak your body in the hot tub and plunge into the refreshing pool. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs or retreat into the veranda's cool shade. Fire up the barbecue and relish alfresco meals in the sea-fresh breeze. Kindle the fire pit in the interior courtyard, and sip delicious cocktails under the stars.

The great room is perched between the pool terrace and the courtyard lounge, forming an expansive, indoor/outdoor venue for relaxation and entertainment. The vaulted space features a fireplace, TV, bar, and beautiful dining table with eight tufted chairs. The adjoining kitchen is superbly appointed with chef-grade appliances, generous prep space, and a breakfast bar. There is also a separate media room with cozy seating, a large TV, and a desk.

The master bedroom opens to a private furnished patio, and its ensuite bathroom includes a dual vanity, alfresco shower, and jetted tub. The primary guest suite also features a king bed, direct terrace access, and a deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, alfresco shower, and jetted tub. The other adult guest suite includes a king bed, while the kids' room has two bunk beds (sleeping four).

Diamante offers an extraordinary array of amenities within minutes of the villa's door, including golf courses designed by Tiger Woods and Davis Love III, the par-3 Oasis Short Course, a fabulous spa, a fitness center, miles of hiking trails, and 1.5 miles of private coastline with enchanting beaches and dunes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
One of the most prestigious properties on Mismaloya’s beautiful coast, Villa Mandarinas captures breathtaking ocean views from its six level, oceanfront estate. From its highest point, you’ll have an ocean vista as far as the eye can see. For a closer look, head down to the oceanfront terrace, which features a manmade tidal pool, and a pier for ocean access. Nearby, you’ll find golf, local restaurants, Puerto Vallarta, and beautiful beachfront, just minutes from home.

Architecturally, Villa Mandarinas is an exciting, adventurous tropical getaway. Its vibrant color scheme and vast amount of indoor/outdoor living space will leave you with something new to discover every day. Green spaces, hay-thatched roofs, mature palm trees, and ocean views flow throughout interior spaces, ensuring the open-air, tropical atmosphere is ever-present. In the common spaces, you’ll find plush furniture, plenty of natural wood and stone accents, high-end electronics, and an eclectic collection of local art. The fully equipped kitchen is decked out in thick granite and stainless steel appliances, sure to inspire culinary creativity. And, there’s a brick pizza oven on the terrace.

Outside, you’ll love the functionality of the multi-level terrace. It’s easy to find space for group gatherings, as well as smaller sitting areas, perfect for more intimate moments. On the upper level, you’ll find alfresco dining, the heated swimming pool, hot tub, and plenty of furnished lounge space. On the ocean level, you’ll love cooling off in the tidal pool, relaxing in the hammock, and watching the sunset from the sun bed, all to the sound of waves washing over the rocky shore.

With eleven uniquely themed bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, you and your guests will have the utmost privacy during your stay. There are seven master suites, all with king sized beds, ocean views, and their own private terraces.

Nearby, you’ll love the exciting city of Puerto Vallarta. Known for its outdoor activities, Puerto Vallarta is perfect for water sports, golf, and plenty of beachfront bars and restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Puerto Vallarta was once a sleepy little town where the locals made their living without tourists, timeshares or even an airport. Visitors were so infrequent that the locals could tell you how many were in town on any given day. Strangely enough, Puerto Vallarta’s tourism boom did not come from Puerto Vallarta at all but from Banderas Bay’s most coveted jewel, Mismaloya.

feature.p: In 1963 John Huston’s “The Night of the Iguana” was filmed using Mismaloya’s virgin coasts and unspoiled jungles as a backdrop. John Huston once wrote that he was the only person who cared for the place; he was of course, very wrong. The legend, surrounding the production and the many twists and turns of the cast’s romances while filming, had Americans flocking to theaters in droves, turning once unknown Puerto Vallarta into the dream destination for millions of Mexico’s Northern neighbors. The incredible influx of tourism over the years changed Puerto Vallarta into one of the world’s most popular vacation destinations, and while Puerto Vallarta grew, the people who wanted to retain the ambience and feel of Banderas Bay’s once virgin coastlines rediscovered Mismaloya’s beauty and tranquility. While Puerto Vallarta’s landscape and terrain allows for more and more expansion, homes in Mismaloya are rare. Most of Mismaloya exists in a single tier walking inland from coast, to home, to the road and finally to the Sierra Madre mountains.

listing.listing_description:
Snorkel off Seven Mile Beach, experience the finest spa in the Caribbean, and return to this serene, ocean-view suite at Kimpton Seafire Resort. Named for the fiery glow of the sunset off Grand Cayman's west coast, this lifestyle resort has been ranked among the region's best, with a wide array of sport, wellness, and dining offerings. The suite itself enjoys panoramic ocean views and features everything you need for a rejuvenating escape.

Designed to embrace the ocean's presence, the residence features free-flowing layout with folding glass doors opening to an expansive vista. Enjoy coffee and breakfast at the table by the open wall, or spend quiet afternoons with a book in the lounge. Prepare meals in the chef-grade kitchen, select a bottle from the wine bridge, and gather for private meals around the 8-person table.

Family-friendly accommodations include a master bedroom with king bed, a main guestroom with queen bed, and a third suite with a pair of twin-sized beds. All 3 rooms have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys a private, ocean-view terrace and deluxe bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and soaking tub; the main guest suite also opens to a private terrace.

The first lifestyle resort on Grand Cayman Island, Kimpton Seafire offers a wonderful array of amenities and activities for guests of all ages. Choose from 2 swimming pools for your morning dip, enjoy a workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center, or refresh yourself with a yoga class. Drop the kids off at Camp Seafire before indulging in a trip to the spa. Beyond the resort, conquer the fairways of North Sound Golf Club or take the whole family to Cayman Turtle Farm, Dolphin Discovery, or Stingray City. For an unforgettable meal, the resort's Ave Restaurant is one of the island's finest.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This two-bedroom luxury apartment is located within Tamarind Hills, an extraordinary community of villas on the south shore of Antigua, within walking distance of Darkwood and Ffryes Beaches. Superbly appointed for a rejuvenating Caribbean getaway, the private home features an outdoor plunge pool, ample living and dining areas, and a fully equipped kitchen. Each of the ocean-view bedrooms features a king bed and ensuite bathroom, accommodating up to four guests in total comfort. The vacation rental includes housekeeping and 24-hour security, while numerous deluxe services are available.

The apartment is nestled amid flowering gardens and lush palm trees, yielding to sweeping views of the turquoise sea. Lounge chairs invite you to bask in the exquisite sunlight, while the plunge pool offers cool refreshment under the sun or stars. The shaded deck includes a barbecue grill and sea-view table for four. Lovely wooden boardwalks follow the coastline from the villas to the nearby beaches.

Folding glass doors join the terrace with the open-concept interior, infusing the home with gorgeous views and soothing breezes. The kitchen features chef-quality appliances for the contemporary gourmet, and opens to the alfresco dining deck. Air conditioning, excellent media features, and an office nook create a comfortable environment for all guests. The décor balances modern sophistication with natural wood accents and touches of Caribbean artistry.

The bedrooms provide peaceful private havens for couples or individual travelers, with high ceilings, air conditioning, satellite and cable TV, celling fans, and a balcony. The cavernous master bedroom enjoys exceptional views, with a corner location and ample windows framing the sea.

Tamarind Hills offers an ideal balance of stylish comfort, privileged privacy, and a prime location within easy reach of some of Antigua's finest beaches and nightlife spots. In addition to Darkwood and Ffryes, you're a three-minute drive from Coco Beach, and within walking distance of Old Sugar Windmill Ruins.

Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details

The perfect home base for your large group’s Caribbean getaway, One Perfect Day is one of St. Thomas’ most impressive luxury villas, with nine en-suite bedrooms, accommodations for twenty-six, and instant beachfront access to Magen’s Bay. With a lengthy list of amenities, this spacious vacation home is an amazing setting for a beachfront wedding, family reunion, or high-end corporate retreat. Within minutes of Magen’s Bay, you’ll find golf, natural and historical wonders, plenty more beautiful beachfront, and the vibrant city of Charlotte Amalie.

Under One Perfect Day’s peaked ceilings, you’ll find designer furniture, state of the art electronics, dynamic ocean views, and an airy, open concept layout that makes group gatherings a breeze. The villa comes with a fully equipped kitchen, wine fridge, an outdoor wet bar, barbecues, and formal and alfresco dining options. And, the integrated sound system, billiard/ping pong table, exercise and massage rooms, and televisions will provide entertainment inside.

On the terrace and beachfront, paradise awaits. With multiple living, dining, and lounging areas, you’ll have plenty of space to gather as one or break off from the group for more intimate occasions. The infinity pool and calm waters of Magen’s Bay are beautiful places to beat the heat. And, during your stay, you’ll have daily maid service, a concierge, and the use of three clear kayaks.

One Perfect Day comes with two Family Suites that feature king-sized beds and two twin bunk beds, as well as lounge areas and en-suite bathrooms. There are seven more king bedrooms, all with en-suites. And, the Master Bedroom enjoys a private balcony, walk-in closet, alfresco shower, and an amazing ocean view.

St. Thomas is a relatively small island, so visiting sites like Drake’s Seat, Blackbeard’s Castle, and Tombstone Rock can all easily be enjoyed in an afternoon. If you’re in the mood to dine out, do some duty-free shopping, or dance the night away, visit Charlotte Amalie, the island’s capital, just ten minutes from home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A gorgeous white-sand beach, charming eco-friendly atmosphere and personalized service await you at Hacienda Chekul. Modeled on traditional buildings, the four-bedroom villa offers gracious, luxurious accommodations in a beautiful beachfront setting near Tulum. Located in the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve, the property is respectful of its surroundings and uses sustainable solar and wind power.

The villa’s traditional hacienda architecture extends to its outdoor living spaces, where you’ll find living and dining rooms under an arched veranda. Just beyond, there’s a sunny deck with lounge chairs and a hammock on the path to the beach. A rooftop terrace and pool provide ample opportunities for sunbathing, and an outdoor shower is convenient after a day at the beach. The villa is equipped with Sky TV, Wi-Fi Bluetooth speakers, and the services of a cook, butler, housekeeper and villa manager are included in your stay.

Arched doorways, beamed ceilings and bright tilework add charm and cheer to the interiors of Hacienda Chekul. The open, airy living and dining room feature neutral-toned sofas and cane-backed chairs, set off by a patterned floor, turquoise throw pillows and a wrought-iron chandelier. The fully equipped kitchen is warm and welcoming, with yellow walls, rich wood cabinets and a well-loved farmhouse-style table used as a center island.

Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and TV, and opens to the terrace. Three of the bedrooms have king beds, and the fourth has two double beds. Sleep soundly in beautiful four-poster or suspended beds in rooms adorned with tall windows and doors, tiled floors and bright, tropical hues of coral and azure.

Start or end each day with a stroll on Boca Paila Beach, just steps from the villa, and make time during your stay to explore the surrounding Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. You’ll find dining and nightlife in Tulum, 14 miles away, and another stretch of sand to explore at Papaya Playa Beach, 10 miles away. Make your connection at Cancun International Airport, 87 miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Step into an accommodation experience on the sunlit Costa Maya unlike any other, with this expansive villa occupying an idyllic position on the southern edge of Playa del Carmen. This location allows guests to enjoy airy rooms, gardens, terraces and alfresco dining at the property, with the sunkissed beach being just a few metres beyond. The town’s fun-filled nightlife is close, but not too close. 

Casa Gigi offers an experience that just keeps giving more and more. Guests will slip into the huge, winding pool, only to find distinct sections and secluded side pools. Cool, marble-floor interiors stretch on for room after room, complete with thoughtful wooden detailing and imperial-style pillars. A private rooftop courtyard gets you closer to the azure blue sky, while the soft breeze from the Caribbean softly drifts across the property’s sheltered terrace. After a complimentary welcome breakfast in the air-conditioned interior, enjoy cool drinks and garden sports under the shade of the huge palm trees that tower up from the villa’s beautifully-maintained gardens. Basking in the famous warmth of this part of Mexico, guests will particularly enjoy the marble bathrooms, including walk-in and sit-down showers, for total refreshment after a day spent on the beach or soaking up the town’s atmosphere.

The tropical Costa Maya offers a huge range of outings for those staying at Casa Gigi. Trips include outings to the serene off-shore island of Cozumel, tours inland to the jungle-ringed Maya pyramid of Cobá, and the opportunity to dive into the shaded, enchanting cenotes that are so well-known along this stretch of coast. Guests can enjoy superbly serviced balnearios in the Playa del Carmen area, take on exhilarating buggy and ATV tours along forest trails, and even take trips to the haunting underground rivers of the region, full of subterranean crystals and towering stalagmites. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located on a secluded beach on Anguilla’s southern shore, Tequila Sunrise is a spacious and contemporary beach house on Lover’s Cove in Dropsey Bay. The villa overlooks the Caribbean Sea and offers stunning views of the mountains of St Martin. Known for its pristine white sand beaches and clear turquoise seas, Anguilla offers a casual island tempo so you can get the rest and relaxation you deserve.

Have a splash about in the crisp waters of the infinity swimming pool. The deck features padded sun loungers and umbrellas, and additional loungers can be found right at the beach. Enjoy some time in the sway of the hammock as you snooze or get into your latest read. The exteriors also include an outdoor lounge and an alfresco dining set, perfect for barbeques! Indoors at Tequila Sunrise, you will find a home entertainment system, a wine fridge and a tequila dispenser. Wi-Fi, housekeeping and complimentary continental breakfasts are included with your reservation.

Large glass doors and windows optimize the ocean views along with the miles of surrounding natural landscape. Tequila Sunrise’s vantage point allows guests to enjoy both sunrises and sunsets. The furnishings are modern and comfortable, and the interiors are airy and bright. The modern kitchen comes fully equipped with everything required by the culinary genius in your group. The unique design of this villa brings the concept of indoor/outdoor living to a crescendo.

Three immaculate bedrooms accommodate up to six guests at Tequila Sunrise. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, alfresco showers, air conditioning, ceiling fans, media centers and writing desks. Each suite also offers direct access to a private patio. Take in the fresh sea breeze!

Secluded Lover’s Cove Beach is just a leisurely two minute walk along a path from Tequila Sunrise. It’s a small bay with a white sand beach that provides great snorkeling and exploring. Make it an unforgettable time at this bijou villa. With a name like Tequila Sunrise, you can simply expect a great time on your next vacation to sunny Anguilla. Whether you have come to the tropics for tennis, watersports, golf or nightlife, you’ll find it all on this magical island where the warm climate is only matched by the friendliness of the locals.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located within Diamante Resort’s private beach community, with an amazing view of the golf course, this luxury villa is just minutes from so many great amenities. Whether you’re looking to spend your day on the course, the beach, or in the city, Beach Estate thirty-seven will have you there with ease. Perfect for a larger family vacation, a golf trip with friends, or a small corporate retreat, this private villa has sleeping accommodations for ten and plenty of social space to explore throughout the property.

This modern beach house easily opens to the terrace, inviting natural sunlight and ocean breeze to flow throughout its spacious interior. An open concept layout and a minimalistic approach to design creates a simple, yet chic, space for your vacation. The decor is high end electronics, designer furniture, and eclectic local art. There are plenty of different social areas for guests to gather, or find solitude. The kitchen is loaded with state of the art stainless steel appliances and a functional atmosphere.

Inside, there’s formal dining for ten, a breakfast bar, Wi-Fi, television, and the villa comes with housekeeping every other day. On the terrace, the swimming pool and hot tub are perfect for relaxing and rejuvenating after a long day on the course. There’s also an outdoor kitchen and barbecue on the terrace, great for sneaking away for a quick lunch before you head back to the course. Some of Diamante’s other amenities include, Crystal Lagoon, spa and wellness centre, fitness facilities, beach club, and on-site restaurants and bars.

A few minutes away in Cabo San Lucas, you’ll find international restaurants, beachfront bars, shopping, and a vibrant nightlife scene. Medano beach is close as well, there you’ll find a bustling tourism scene, great for first time surfers. If you’re a golf aficionado, The Dunes course at Diamante, designed by Davis Love III, is one of Golf Magazine’s “Best Courses in the World”. And, El Cardonal, designed by Tiger Woods, is on Diamante’s estate as well. A challenging eighteen with several strategic options for each hole.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Located in the exclusive development of Punta Ballena, home to the famous Auberge Esperanza Resort, Villa Tranquila is a spacious and private vacation rental just a ten minute walk from the beach. Showcasing colonial design and loaded with perks, this stunning vacation rental makes a great bet for a family holiday, a corporate retreat or a special event like a wedding or a birthday. Experience the best of Cabo with Luxury Retreats!

The backyard at this fabulous residence boasts oceanfront views and spacious entertaining areas. You will find a covered area to enjoy a book in the shade and a large space for sunning next to the private heated swimming pool with built-in hot tub. Fire up the gas barbeque and enjoy the catch of the day at the poolside palapa. Relax in the hammocks and sun loungers. Guests of Villa Tranquil will have access to the Punta Ballena Beach Club with fitness center, the Esperanza Spa and the nearby restaurants, all just a short walk or drive in the golf cart included with the rental. Walking paths and tennis courts are also available nearby.

The open plan kitchen, dining and living area enjoys sweeping ocean views and the layout and furnishings are perfect for convivial gatherings. The sliding glass doors open up completely for seamless indoor/outdoor living. The fully equipped kitchen features modern stainless steel appliances and a long breakfast bar.

Four exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Three of the bedrooms are located in the main house, two of them with ocean views. The fourth bedroom is in the casita and has its own entrance. The casita is perfect for a couple still on honeymoon or guests requiring more privacy. Enjoy the sounds of the fountain as you fall sound asleep!

Known for its nightlife and the fabulous El Arco rock formation, Cabo San Lucas is a dream destination. For lovers of water sports, the Los Cabos Corridor offers many options along its various beaches. Golf aficionados will feel right at home in the “Tourist Corridor” with its many championship courses. Old world Mexico combined with modern day amenities means a perfect holiday in the sun at Villa Tranquila!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This exquisite St. Barts villa is nestled on the slopes of Morne du Vitet, near the island's highest peak. With expansive views of the Caribbean Sea framed by the verdant coastal hills, the villa features ample outdoor living areas for savoring the sea-kissed breeze. Two queen bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms make Valley an ideal vacation rental for two couples, small groups of friends, or families seeking privacy and sublime vistas within minutes of some of the region's finest beaches.

An infinite swimming pool stretches from the veranda toward the horizon, inviting you to bathe in its soothing waters. Sun loungers await you on the sunny deck, an ideal spot for sipping refreshments while gazing at the sea and sky. A dining table for ten welcomes alfresco meals in the pergola's dappled shade.

Pocket doors open from the veranda to the open-plan interior, allowing the home to breathe the island air. An interior dining table parallels the veranda, forming a lovely space for larger dinner parties. The kitchen is fully equipped with contemporary gourmet appliances, and serves a breakfast bar and the two dining tables. A cozy, L-shaped sectional invites you to pre-dinner cocktails or nighttime digestifs. The décor is understated, comfortable, and chic throughout, with luminous white walls and vaulted ceilings accentuating the beauty of Saint Barthelmy.

The bedrooms likewise offer an elegant and comforting simplicity, ideal for private downtime and peaceful nights. Each enjoys ocean views and is equipped with an HD TV, iPod docking station, and ensuite bathroom with rain shower. Air conditioning and ceilings fans keep you cool on balmy days.

From its secluded hillside, Valley is within minutes of some of the finest beaches in the Caribbean, the closest being Marigot, Lorient, Nikki, Petit Cul de Sac, and Saint Jean. The dining and nightlife of Gustavia are about twenty minutes away. Less than five kilometers to the airport, Valley is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or easy weekend escapes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From its scenic perch in Peterborg, this Caribbean luxury villa captures incredible views of the sea and nearby, Magen’s Bay Beach. The stately Pallina features accommodations for eight, spread across four bedrooms, two of which are considered masters, both with king beds, ensuites, and ocean views. The island’s capital, Charlotte Amalie, is where you’ll find most of St. Thomas’ boutique shops, restaurants, and nightlife establishments. However, the furthest reaches of St. Thomas are easily accessible in a short drive, making the entire island yours to discover.

Pallina’s elegant interior decor shows off its colonial roots with white-washed walls, rich wood tones, and chandelier lighting. The fully equipped kitchen is decked out with stainless steel appliances, sure to inspire culinary creativity. There’s formal and alfresco dining areas, as well as a barbeque on the terrace for more casual meals. And, thanks to numerous openings to the terrace, Pallina enjoys the fresh sea breeze, natural sunlight, and a social open-air flow throughout its entire estate.

On the terrace, you’ll love relaxing in the hot tub, perfecting your tan from a sun lounger, and splashing around in the swimming pool. Back inside, you’ll appreciate Pallina’s, wine fridge, and air conditioning.

Feel like exploring? St. Thomas is known for its incredible snorkeling, kayaking, and scuba diving tours that take you around the island’s gorgeous inlets and mangroves. If you’d prefer to stay dry, check out some of the island’s most important historical sites, like Black Beard’s Castle, Tombstone Rock, and Ninety-Nine Steps. . When it’s time to head for the beach, Magen’s Bay, Hull Bay, Coki Point, and Lindbergh beaches are all within ten-kilometers.

listing.listing_description:
Escape the real world in style at Coracali. This incredible Costa Rica vacation rental has stunning modern architecture and an unbeatable beachfront location in Santa Teresa, along with three bedrooms that can accommodate up to six friends or family members. What it doesn’t have is a TV, meaning you can make a total getaway from the news cycle on your tropical holiday.

Feel the ocean breeze, bask in the warm weather and watch the sunset from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, plenty of loungers, a gas barbecue and a dining table. While there is no television, the villa does have a Sonos sound system, so you can use a favorite playlist as the soundtrack to your stay, and Wi-Fi, so you can share photos with friends back at home.

Coracali is laid out in a V-shape around the pool, with an open-concept great room in one arm. Wall-to-wall glass showcases the ocean views, and clerestory windows that follow the peaked roofline flood the space with light. A warm, wood-paneled ceiling stretches over the cozy sitting area, a dining table for six and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds and patio access, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning for your comfort on the hottest tropical nights.

From the villa’s setting at the point where Playa Santa Teresa meets Playa Cocal, it’s easy to relive your honeymoon with a stroll on the beach, enjoy resort amenities from yoga to dining at nearby Florblanca or take a quick trip to the grocery store. It’s also a short drive to the nearest downtown area with a range of shops, restaurants and nightlife options.

listing.listing_description:
Sol e Luna is a very pretty, French Creole style villa that blends Caribbean charm with a contemporary attitude. Past the new gate, a long drive lined with lovely palms and tropical plants delivers you to the inviting entrance. The beautiful view captures your eye the moment you step inside. It is a stunning vista filled with the lush green mountains that roll along the spine of St Martin and the deep blue of Simpsons Bay Lagoon and the endless blue sky. The spacious terraces provide a multitude of peaceful spots to simply sit and watch the sunrise and the sunset while cooled by gentle breezes.

Wonderful, deep covered loggias filled with ample seating, both for private interludes and group gatherings, fill the terrace. A huge outdoor dining table under a large gazebo makes you feel as if you are dining al-fresco at the edge of a tropical jungle paradise. The view is stunning. The large pool sits center stage on the terrace. Newly enlarge and refurbished, it is a wonderful place to do laps, cool off or just lounge with a cool drink.

The interiors open wide to the outdoors; large glass doors disappear seamlessly into the walls creating a lovely flow out to pool and terrace. The open plan great room has a contemporary attitude filled with comfortable seating for both dining and lounging. Clean lines, soft neutral tone and pops of hot color compliment the dark wood furniture and the well-chosen accessories. A newly remodeled, modern gourmet kitchen is sleek and elegant, yet quite well equipped. It opens to the view.

The three bedrooms are equal size and all under one roof, all just off the great room. Each one has a beautiful view and private seating on the terrace. The décor is filled with beautiful fabrics and linens in white and soft neutrals, creating a serene place to relax. All have pretty spa style en-suite bathrooms with walk-in showers and tumbled marble, river pebbles and white cabinetry. One has a large Moroccan style outdoor shower and one has a sea view.

You are close to amenities. Five minutes to Cupecoy for grocery shopping and fine and casual dining and another 10 minutes to our International airport SXM and Maho's restaurants and casinos. A short 15-minute drive and you are at the International airport or the nightlife of Maho. The French Capital, Marigot, is only 15 minutes from the villa where you can enjoy Duty Free shopping, boutiques, bakeries and the Creole Market.

listing.listing_description:
Sea Horse Ranch is a destination that caters perfectly for a short or extended stay in an exotic location, coupled with being a wonderful place to absorb the Caribbean culture and lifestyle.

This luxury residential resort in the Dominican Republic has lush tropical gardens and exclusive amenities such as semi-private sandy beaches, oceanfront swimming pools, a tennis club with five clay courts, an equestrian centre, and one of the North Coast’s best seaside gourmet restaurants, The Beach Club. Villa Dos Cascadas is a sprawling 7500 square foot open floor plan single-story ranch tucked away on a private cul-de-sac, just a short walk to the Beach Club and oceanfront swimming pools. Every inch has been meticulously designed and constructed by local craftsmen who seamlessly connected the natural beauty of this oceanfront location with polished coral rock and mahogany woodwork. This one of a kind property also includes top-quality imported fixtures, hand-made furniture, and original artwork by local Dominican talent. Sleeps ten people comfortably with a total of four bedrooms, seven beds, including two sofa beds and five bathrooms. Each bedroom suite has their own private washroom, walk in closet, and walk-out terrace leading to the luxurious pool and waterfall. This home is spoiled with living space, both indoor and out, and a beautifully designed, fully-equipped chef's kitchen. For those

down days or tv nights there is a closed air conditioned entertainment area with beautiful hard-wood floors. For meals out, a healthy, eclectic menu at The Beach Club offers favourites that please all. The equestrian centre is a special amenity that appeals to all ages, with pony rides for young

children, or trail rides along the beach for families and couples.

The Dominican Republic is ranked among the top vacation destinations in the Caribbean and offers one of the most historic and culturally rich locations available. With many options to

explore, it is the perfect island for family vacations. The town of Cabarete located nearby is a widely-known water-sports destination, and also appeals to foodies with its great selection of international cuisine. Book your stay and enjoy all that this relaxing ocean destination has to offer.

listing.listing_description:
Indulge in a heavenly stay at Villa Kin Ich. Named for k’inich, or the house of the Mayan sun god, this stylish modern vacation rental is an idyll to rival any luxury resort in the Riviera Maya. Invite up to twenty friends and family to savor its beachfront setting, gorgeous living spaces and proximity to the best of central Playa del Carmen.

Your holiday at Villa Kin Ich includes the services of a private chef, butler, housekeeper and on-site concierge. Play in the water on the provided kayaks and paddleboards, or simply enjoy the Caribbean sun from outdoor living and dining areas with an infinity pool and sound system. There’s even a rooftop terrace with more space to lounge and dine, plus a barbecue and bar.

The villa’s stunning modern architecture and lush landscaping make for a seamless transition between outdoors and in. Feel the ocean breeze in the open-sided living and dining areas or enjoy the water views from a glass-walled media room with a TV, surround sound and pool table. Though your stay includes chef service, there is a fully equipped kitchen, as well as features such as an exercise room and Wi-Fi.

Each of the seven bedrooms at Villa Kin Ich has an en-suite bathroom. There are five with king beds—two with ocean views and two with garden views—and two bedrooms with both a queen bed and two double beds.

Thanks to the villa’s oceanfront location in the exclusive gated community of Playacar, you won’t even need to put on sandals to step out onto one of the area’s best beaches for a little sandcastle building or a honeymoon-style hand-in-hand stroll. It’s also close to Playa del Carmen’s lively 5th Avenue, a pedestrian street where you’ll find a mix of dining, shopping and nightlife. Avid golfers will want to book a tee time on the nearby Hard Rock course, and it’s well worth the drives to both Cenote Chaak Tun and the Tulum ruins.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Blackstone provides modern, gilded comfort amongst the rugged beauty of the windward side of Saint Barthélemy. Take in the serenity of Marigot Bay, relax hard as frigate birds soar overhead, or splash into the blue waters of the Caribbean just seconds away. Enjoy cool, tropical drinks from the terrace as well as the landscape, as night-lights bathe the villa’s wooden alcoves in a warm glow. 

What sets Blackstone apart is how it provides total convenience and modernity amid the primordial, volcanic panorama of this part of St. Bart’s. This is the ideal getaway for a large group of friends or family, with the villa easily accommodating up to 12 guests, with a range of vaulted, decadently-decorated and outfitted bedrooms. Direct access to the villa’s central terrace and pool is never more than a few steps away, with lacquered sliding doors providing versatility and ease-of-movement for all guests. 

Beyond Blackstone’s thoughtful incorporation into the natural landscape, guests can enjoy a huge range of facilities that are in place to meet their every need. Enjoy a refreshing run or cycle in the fitness room, devour a book or catch up with your favourite shows in the huge recreation room or sprawling sun-loungers - each guest can find their own place of peace within Blackstone. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
It is hard to imagine a villa with better beach access than the aptly-named Sea, Sand and Sun in St. Bart’s. This glorious property nestles on the very edge of idyllic Anse des Cayes. Here on one of the island’s best surfing beaches you’ll be bathed in the fresh sea breeze. Dive into your turquoise pool and you’ll feel as if you are immersed in the Atlantic. Take the enticing path through the garden of lush, well-maintained hedges and you’ll emerge on to the dazzling white sands which cover the rocky shore.

This enchanting cottage-style villa makes the very most of its location. As the sun raises its sleepy head from behind the rocky promontory it heralds days full of adventure or relaxation. From your sun-kissed lounger by your azure pool you will have a front row seat on the mighty Atlantic. Settle under the shade of your veranda and you can dine al fresco against a backdrop of swaying palms and fleeting clouds. As night falls, slip into your hot tub and marvel at the panoramic views of a red-tinged sunset.

Sea, Sand and Sun blends traditional French Caribbean architecture with a range of modern conveniences. Here among the lush vegetation your pristine white cottage delivers comfort with a little Gallic flair. Vaulted roofs studded with white beams let the air flow freely through open plan rooms. Floor to ceiling glass walls and doors let the light flood in. Comfortable, unfussy furniture and a well-equipped kitchen provide for your needs along with your own daily housekeeper.

The villa’s stylish, air-conditioned bedrooms deliver everything you need for restful nights in the Caribbean. The impressive master suite looks out on to the shaded terrace, deck and pool. Here you can lie back in an elegant four-poster king-sized bed and drift off to sleep. Next door, the tastefully decorated second room boasts a queen-sized bed and views of the leafy garden. Both feature superb en-suite facilities with quirky but delightful, sea-themed décor.

Sea, Sand and Sun delivers on its name with a reassuring regularity. On average, St.Barts enjoys 3,000 hours of sunshine every year. Temperatures in the 70s and 80s also ensure that you can always enjoy the sea and sand on your own doorstep. Anse des Cayes is renowned for surfing but if you’d prefer a more leisurely day at the beach just head for one of a dozen others within driving distance. It also pays to take time to explore this idyllic French Caribbean island and its picturesque, yacht-friendly capital of Gustavia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The picturesque approach to Belle Fontaine sets the mood for this elegant French Provence meets Creole style villa. A long stone walled drive, lined with tropical flowers and shrubs, brings you to the entrance filled with architectural beauty. Coral stones embedded with colorful ceramic tiles, Moorish inspired arches and windows trimmed in blue, country style shutters and terracotta roof offer an exotic tropical welcome. From the moment you step inside, the view spans before you. Swaying palms frame the sapphire blue sea, endless sky and the outline of Saba. Colorful tropical gardens surround the house and deck. The mood is very peaceful.

Set in expansive epi wood, the new double pool dazzles in blues. The smaller pool is inset with a tiled table, just waiting for your cold beverage. The larger pool is for swimming under the Caribbean sun. Surrounding the pool is crisp blue and white deck furniture that perfectly complements the view. Tall palms and native boulders accent the deck. A large gazebo, set to one side of the terrace, contains generous seating for lounging and dining, plus a built in BBQ. It’s a superb place to relax and watch the colorful sunsets.

The cool interiors are designed to take full advantage of the view. Floor to ceiling glass doors, terracotta floors, high vaulted ceilings and arched windows accent the spacious areas for seating and dining. The décor blends modern exotic lines with the softness of Provence. Rattan, teak and bleached woods are adorned with white and blue fabrics. Underfoot, oriental carpets add exotic color; eclectic decorative pieces complement the mood. The large, well equipped kitchen has a French country attitude. Large arched windows bring in the view and connect the kitchen to the terrace.

The five equal size bedrooms are spacious and glamourous. Three have sea views from the bedroom; two have garden views. The décor is romantic in tranquil shades of white touched with color. The beautiful spa style bathrooms, detailed with fabulous fixtures, have a modern Moorish touch. Large walk-in showers overlook the sea or garden; one has a private outdoor patio.

Although quite secluded you are close to the Terres Basses beaches. You are two minutes to Baie Nettle and seven minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, the Creole Market, galleries and shopping. It’s a 10 minute drive to the airport and 30 minutes to both Grand Case and Phillipsburg.

listing.listing_description:
With an unmatched level of privacy, luxury, and convenience, Finisterre offers a truly sumptuous enclave for your St. John vacation. “Finisterre” comes from the Latin phrase “finis terrae,” meaning “end of the earth,” and upon your arrival at this sprawling home, the inspiration for this moniker becomes immediately apparent. Nestled above the shoreline on Bovocoap Point, Finisterre affords sweeping, unobstructed views of the brilliant blues of Hart Bay and Rendezvous Bay beyond, with the wild, windswept Ram Head point in the distance. This, combined with the two-acre compound’s utmost level of privacy, lends a feeling of seclusion and indeed of being at the end of the earth.

Each of the six bedrooms at this completely refreshed 1950s bohemian traditional Caribbean-style home has been given its own Latin name, inspired by the features that make Finisterre so special. The rooms Cassiopeia and Andromeda are a nod to the expansive, glittering night sky that stretches above this private estate, while the poolside bedroom, Cetus—meaning whale—pays homage to the gentle giants that migrate through Virgin Islands waters in the winter, when you can witness them breaching from Finisterre’s plethora of outdoor spaces.

The large pool features a submerged tanning ledge, ideal for splashing with your littlest loved ones or for reclining under the warm Caribbean sun. A variety of seating areas, both covered and uncovered, border the pool, meaning your entire party can gather in the comfort of the tranquil tradewinds that waft peacefully through Finisterre’s outdoor spaces. The home’s pod-style layout ensures that afternoon siestas or moments of solitude can be enjoyed in the utmost of privacy.

A media room, gym, and game room with pool table offer more than enough to keep you and your traveling companions busy, but should you wish to strike out and explore the island’s natural beauty, Finisterre is just a 15-minute drive to St. John’s unspoiled north shore beaches. The shopping, bars, and restaurants in bustling Cruz Bay are less than 10 minutes away by car.

For a true escape with a blend of exclusive comfort and enjoyment that you won’t find anywhere else on St. John, come vacation at the end of the earth—Finisterre.

listing.listing_description:
Feel hot, hot, hot with a holiday at Casa Buena Suerte - Soliman Bay. Not only is this beautiful Tulum vacation rental set on a sunny stretch of pristine beach, it’s located in one of the trendiest spots in the Riviera Maya. Invite up to twelve of your coolest friends to fill its six bedrooms, or let the attentive staff pamper you and your extended family.

As part of your stay at this luxury property, you’ll book meal service with a talented chef, sous chef and server, and a villa manager and housekeeper will see to your needs. Spend your days listening to the waves or soaking in the sun from the infinity pool or beachfront lounging and dining areas. In the evenings, settle into the home theater or share photos via Wi-Fi.

From its Instagram-ready pink walls to its charming sections of thatched roof, Casa Buena Suerte is a feast for the eyes. Its living and dining rooms are bold and beautiful, filled with details like striped fabric, unique artwork and marble-topped tables. There’s a well-equipped kitchen on the villa’s main level, as well as a smaller kitchen upstairs.

There are five bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in a honeymoon-worthy beachfront palapa suite. All five have king beds, private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and many have sleeper sofas in case extra accommodations are needed.

Set off from the shore in front of Casa Buena Suerte and into the waters of Soliman Bay in the three provided kayaks. If you’re setting off by car instead, it’s a 15-minute drive or less into downtown Tulum, where you’ll find another beach, restaurants and a grocery store, and a 20-minute drive to the nearest golf course. Don’t miss the chance to tour the area’s famed Mayan ruins overlooking the ocean and the jungle.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
